name: Anavo Consulting Group

Who We Are: We are a highly specialized market research and strategic consulting firm that focuses on providing client with insights that drive more effective sales and customer retention efforts.

What We Do: We obtain unbiased feedback directly from prospects and customer to help our clients understand why then win business, how they retain it and why they lose it.

Why You Should Care: We can give you the strategic persepectives you need to make better decisions about marketing, sales, product development and client service
